gpt_comment: The weather in Brussels appears consistent across sources, with an average temperature of 23.4°C and no expected rainfall. A minor breeze at 8mph will accompany the balmy temperatures, making it a perfect day for a stroll in the park. If you spot a monkey in the Brussels city park, remember it's just as much a fan of warm, sunny days as you are!
